history.narrative: Law 3-171 was submitted to the electors of the District of Columbia on November 4, 1980, as Initiative No. 3. The results of the voting, certified by the Board of Election and Ethics on November 21, 1980, were 90,533 for the Initiative and 60,972 against the Initiative. It was transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review on January 19, 1981.
